MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Sandholes Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.11pm. Our engineers have arrived at Chuckie Lane substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:36pm on Friday, 11 December 2020
